link.title: Hammer.js
link.description: Hammer is a open-source library that can recognize gestures made by touch, mouse and pointerEvents. It doesn’t have any dependencies, and it’s small, only 7.34 kB minified + gzipped!

link.title: Howler.js
link.description: Audio library for the modern web. howler.js makes working with audio in JavaScript easy and reliable across all platforms.

link.title: Hostinguk.net
link.description: Its an evolving story, one focussed on never staying still, delivering technical solutions to human problems, and ultimately always delivering the best quality service to our customers.
